list.stitle: ARKs are high-functioning identifiers that lead you to things and to descriptions of those things.
list.comment: Aspects: [Augment with existing IDs|https://francesmadden.github.io/PIDResources/Augment.html], [Commit to persisting IDs|https://francesmadden.github.io/PIDResources/Commit%20to%20persisting.html], [Human readable IDs|https://francesmadden.github.io/PIDResources/Human%20readable%20PIDs.html], [Machine readable IDs|https://francesmadden.github.io/PIDResources/Machine%20readable%20PIDs.html], [Globally resolvable IDs|https://francesmadden.github.io/PIDResources/Globally%20resolvable%20PIDs.html].

list.stitle: Consortium of European Taxonomic Facilities scheme of identifiers for specimens
list.comment: Aspects: [Augment with existing IDs|https://francesmadden.github.io/PIDResources/Augment.html], [Commit to persisting IDs|https://francesmadden.github.io/PIDResources/Commit%20to%20persisting.html], [Human readable IDs|https://francesmadden.github.io/PIDResources/Human%20readable%20PIDs.html], [Machine readable IDs|https://francesmadden.github.io/PIDResources/Machine%20readable%20PIDs.html]

list.stitle: Dewey Decimal Classification is a proprietary library classification
Digital Object Identifier, a globally governed PID infrastructure. DOIs are particularly used for research-related objects
list.comment: Aspects: [Augment with existing IDs|https://francesmadden.github.io/PIDResources/Augment.html], [Commit to persisting IDs|https://francesmadden.github.io/PIDResources/Commit%20to%20persisting.html], [Human readable IDs|https://francesmadden.github.io/PIDResources/Human%20readable%20PIDs.html], [Machine readable IDs|https://francesmadden.github.io/PIDResources/Machine%20readable%20PIDs.html], [Globally resolvable IDs|https://francesmadden.github.io/PIDResources/Globally%20resolvable%20PIDs.html].
